entry.title: New release for DAVx⁵: v4.5-ose
entry.content:
Video announcement and short tutorial

Announcement video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3TWb5U6pPYg YT Shorts version: https://www.youtube.com/shorts/fWhaLgcrcvI Tutorial for Nextcloud: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ppvt1TS8VVA

What is Push and why do I need it?

TLDR;

Get updates for your contacts/events/tasks/notes instantly on your mobile device instead of polling the server in regular intervals like once an hour.

Requirements:

  • DAVx5: minimal version DAVx5 4.5 (released June 2025)
  • FCM (pre-installed on devices with Google Play Store) or any UnifiedPush distributor app (ntfy, Conversations, the NextPush app for Android, Mozillas Sunup, etc).
  • The server must support WebDAV Push.

More Details

WebDAV Push is a very new addition to the WebDAV ecosystem and extends the WebDAV Standard with the ability to make synchronization in near-realtime. So if a file on the WebDAV server is added, changed or deleted you will receive this instantly also on your mobile devices via DAVx5.

This is especially useful for Contacts, Events and Tasks all of which DAVx5 offers synchronization for. Whenever a resource on the server changes (be it from directly changing it or if the change is being made from another device) you should get this update within a few seconds depending on network and server speed.

How-to-use in 5 steps (watch the video):

  1. Install and activate the servers WebDAV Push extension (for example the Nextcloud dav_push app in your Nextcloud App center – minimal version 0.0.3)
  2. If you add a new account, continue with step 3. If already have an existing DAVx5 account:
  3. refresh the collection list in the CalDAV/CardDAV tabs to receive the new information that the server supports WebDAV Push and check in the details view of a collection if you see either a "Server announces Push support" or "Subscribed message with a date".
  4. If you add a fresh DAVx5 account, the capability of Push will be detected during setup.
  5. Choose or Change the Push distributor in the DAVx5 settings at the very bottom.
  6. To test it, add an event, contact or task on the server side and open your respective Contacts / Calendars / Tasks app on Android. You should get the change within 5 – 60 seconds (depending on network speed)

Resources for server developers:

In order to provide your users with the ability to real-time sync data from your server you can implement the WebDAV Push draft. Although it is still a draft this solution already is working in the public. You can see an implementation for example on Nextcloud where this is being solved via an app plugin that can be activated upon a users wish.

See also UnifiedPush 3: https://unifiedpush.org/ and https://codeberg.org/UnifiedPush

  • Redact Authorization header from HTTP requests by @mbiebl in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1520
  • Intro / battery optimizations warning: remove Samsung; change wording from "probably" to "may" by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1532
  • UnknownHostException by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1535

entry.title: New release for DAVx⁵: v4.5.2-ose
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug fixes

  • [Sync framework] Disable contacts content change triggered syncs if sync interval set to manual only by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1569

Refactoring

  • AndroidCalendar refactoring by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1560
  • Synctools: AndroidEvent companion object moved by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1572
  • [synctools] Use EventReader / EventWriter by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1573
  • Move external URIs from Constants to ExternalUris object by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1574
  • Move SyncState to resource package because it's not in the database by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1585
  • Move Insert/update to DAO by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1587
  • Fix exceptions being fetched as Parcelable instead of Serializable in DebugInfoActivity by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1597

Other changes

  • Use system defined line separator by @mbiebl in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1562
  • Sync davx5 / davx5-ose repos by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1575
  • Update cert4android to get 16 kB page size support over Conscrypt 2.5.3 by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1581
  • Update dependencies, including dav4jvm that updates okhttp to 5.x by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1593

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/compare/v4.5.1-ose...v4.5.2-ose

entry.title: New release for DAVx⁵: v4.5.3-ose
entry.content:
What's Changed

New features

  • Follow redirects when adding webdav mount by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1582
  • Icons next to CalDAV/CardDAV tab titles by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1599

Bug fixes

  • [Sync framework] Fix sync always pending on Android 14+ by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1463
  • Use early entry point for sync adapter services by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1610
  • AndroidSyncFrameworkTest: allow optional states by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1625
  • Correctly handle SecurityException for acquireContentProvider by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1622
  • Fix ETag update logic in QueryChildDocumentsOperation by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1626

Refactoring

  • Update synctools for AndroidEvent2 by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1601
  • [UI] Use "(optional)" in labels to indicate optional textfields by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1571
  • Extract discoverHomesets() to ServiceRefresher by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1604
  • Choose real or fake (for tests) SyncAdapter over DI by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1608
  • Extract refreshHomesetsAndTheirCollections to HomeSetRefresher by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1606
  • [WebDAV] Implement command pattern, streamline lifecycle, remove WebdavScope by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1617
  • WebDAV: remove notifications, timeout logic by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1630
  • Replaced Webcal tab icon in collections list by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1628

Other changes

  • Extract refreshPrincipals() to PrincipalsRefresher by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1607
  • Update dependencies, including AGP by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1632
  • Version bump to 4.5.3 by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1637
  • Fetch translations from Transifex by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1638
